author: bennettgberg
body:
#### PR description:

Backport to 12_4_X for: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43354

Adds a Pythia8 Pt Gun with an exponentially falling pT distribution instead of the uniform one.
This backport is needed for Summer22 Central MC production, as requested in this JIRA ticket: https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSBPHMC-52

#### PR validation:

Thoroughly tested in CMSSW_12_4_17 and CMSSW_13_0_14 by generating test events. Also ran code-checks, code-format, and runTheMatrix.py for the master PR. This is just adding a new plugin, so it will not affect any previously existing CMSSW code.

Following this backport, I will also make a backport to CMSSW_13_0_X for Summer23 MC production.
title: Backport to 12_4_X for Py8PtExpGun
